description: Customer data capturing essential details such as contact information, lifetime value, and status, aiding in customer relationship management and analysis.

metadata.description: Unique identifier for each customer, typically in the form of an email address or a unique string.
Identifier for the owner of the customer record; Represents the individual or entity responsible for managing the customer relationship.
Indicates whether the customer record has been marked as deleted.
The name of the customer, which may include first and last names or business names.
Date when the customer record was created; Format is in YYYY-MM-DD.
Identifier for the user who created the customer record.
Date and time when the customer record was last updated; Format is in string representation.
Identifier for the user who last modified the customer record.
Timestamp indicating the last time the record was modified in the system.
Unique identifier for the party associated with the customer record.
The total lifetime value of the customer; Represents the total revenue expected from the customer over their entire relationship with the business.
Indicates the current status of the customer, reflecting their engagement or relationship with the business.
